item.description: Dev terraform provider 基于新框架tpf开发 开发示例： https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-provider-scaffolding-framework https://github.com/serialt/terraform-provider-demo 参考示例： https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-provider-hashicups 1、debug terraform # makefile default: install build: go build -v ./... install: go install -v ./... vscode 调试 terraform provider 1）vscode launch cat .vscode/launch.json { "version": "0.2.0", "configurations": [ {
